channel.title: Permissions on Vanilla Forums Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Permissions on Vanilla Forums Documentation

item.title: Roles & Permissions
item.description: Overview Roles and Permissions are used in tandem to control what users can see and do in your community. Upon account creation, there are 6 default Roles in your Vanilla account. Each of the default Roles have permissions that you would expect from the Role name: Guest: This is a special role that represents inactive sessions in Vanilla. You can use this role to restrict what logged out users see when viewing your forum.
